column3: str

Maru wants YOU to promote the Hippo Riders.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Distribute the Hippo Rider handbills.
Report back to Maru.
I promised the boss I'd try an' get the cart rollin', but lazin' about here ain't exactly goin' to make a job of it...
It ain't much, but I tried makin' some handbills... You think you could pass 'em out around Yedlihmad?
Tell folks that if they bring back one of these, they'll get a discount. That sounds professional, right? Anyhow, I'll leave the talkin' to you─I know you'll explain it good.
You have business with me?
A start-up delivery service...by hippo cart? And here I thought chocobo carriages were the only viable option. What an intriguing angle.
I only off-load luggage, so delivery arrangements are out of my hands, but I'll take this to my friends at the harbor guild. They may yet find some use for it.
Oh, the Hippo Riders! Yes, my friend at the harbor guild tried them straightaway. Wouldn't stop gushing about their speedy carts.
If you could spare a few more handbills, I know of some others who will appreciate that discount!
I'll be sure to pass this along.
May I help you?
A delivery service! By hippo cart, no less. This is perfect timing─it just so happens that I need a parcel delivered to the Giantsgall Grounds without delay.
“Fastest on the island,” are they? I shall certainly put them to the test! Thank you, I'll head over straightaway.
Those speedy Hippo Riders! No false advertising there─they had my package to its recipient in no time at all. Count me a satisfied customer!
I daresay it's time to redeem my second discount. I wonder if I could persuade them into a fixed contract...
Something for me?
Oh! The Hippo Riders! I know a fellow who works there!
Nothing would make me happier than supporting an Arkasodara-run business like this. I simply must find something for them to deliver!
Out promoting the Hippo Riders again? I found something to deliver, and they had it in Radz-at-Han in no time at all─and at a discount!
Of course, I'll be needing it shipped back now, so could I trouble you for another handbill? Oh, and some extras for my friends!
Handed out the handbills, have you?
I'm glad we piqued some interest. Handin' out adverts ain't glamorous, but it sure gets the job done...
I'll keep thinkin' up new ways of gettin' our name out there. Come by again when you've got the time...
